short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Adds a stop button to the player interface to unload the player and stop the video from buffering any time.
short.de: Fügt der Playeroberfläche eine Stopp-Schaltfläche hinzu, um den Player zu entladen und die Pufferung des Videos jederzeit zu…
short.es: Añade un botón de parada a la interfaz del reproductor para descargar el reproductor y evitar que el vídeo se almacene en el búfer…
short.fr: Ajoute un bouton d'arrêt à l'interface du lecteur pour décharger le lecteur et arrêter la mise en mémoire tampon de la vidéo à tout…
short.it: Aggiunge un pulsante di arresto all'interfaccia del lettore per scaricare il lettore e interrompere il buffering del video in…
short.ja: プレーヤーをアンロードして、ビデオのバッファリングをいつでも停止できるように、プレーヤーインターフェイスに停止ボタンを追加します。
short.nl: Voegt een stopknop toe aan de spelerinterface om de speler te ontladen en het bufferen van de video op elk moment te stoppen.
short.pt_BR: Adiciona um botão de parada à interface do player para descarregar o player e impedir que o vídeo seja armazenado em buffer a…
short.pt_PT: Adiciona um botão de paragem à interface do leitor para descarregar o leitor e impedir que o vídeo seja armazenado em buffer a…
short.ru: Добавляет кнопку "Стоп" в интерфейс плеера, чтобы в любой момент выгрузить плеер и остановить буферизацию видео.
short.zh_CN: 在播放器界面上增加了一个停止按钮，可以随时卸载播放器并停止视频的缓冲。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
This extension unloads the YouTube player without affecting the actual page. Removing the player eliminates any network requests to fetch or buffer the video. This is especially useful when you wish to watch the video later without YouTube preloading it and consuming your bandwidth.

Key Features:
1. Disables automatic buffering
2. Halts player-related network activities
3. Unloads the player while keeping the page intact

The extension introduces a new "Stop" button located next to the "Play" button. Click the "Stop" button whenever you want to unload the player.

Additional Notes:
1. This extension exclusively supports the HTML5 player, offering no compatibility with Youtube's old Flash player.
2. Built on manifest v3, this extension adheres to the specified guidelines.
3. It only operates when the "Stop" button is triggered and remains in an idle state at all other times, ensuring no background activities are running.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_CN:
Have you ever wished your YouTube player had an stop button which prevents youTube from buffering (loading) video files when you are not going to watch that particular video? If so you can have it now!

By installing this extension you will get an stop button on the right side of the play button. Pressing this button unloads the YouTube player and hence it will stop buffering videos.

Note: This extension only works with HTML5 players. No button will be appended to the Flash version of the YouTube player.

For other YouTube related tools please check my homepage at http://add0n.com/youtube-tools.html?from=stop-button
